sentences.en: A presidential election was scheduled for last December.
sentences.cn: 一场总统大选计划在去年12月举行。

sentences.en: A tight schedule means we can't delay any longer.
sentences.cn: 一张紧凑的时间表表明我们不能再耽搁。

sentences.en: Construction work fell behind schedule.
sentences.cn: 建筑进度落后于工期。

sentences.en: Despite his hectic work schedule, Benny has rarely suffered poor health.
sentences.cn: 尽管工作繁忙，本尼却少有身体不好的时候。

sentences.en: He has been forced to adjust his schedule.
sentences.cn: 他被迫调整了自己的日程安排。

sentences.en: His punishing schedule seemed to dim his fire at times.
sentences.cn: 繁忙的日程似乎有时让他精力不济。

sentences.en: His punishing work schedule had made him resort to drugs.
sentences.cn: 异常紧张的工作安排使他开始吸毒。

sentences.en: How can he fit everything into his busy schedule ?
sentences.cn: 他是怎么把所有的事情都排进自己忙碌的时间表的？

sentences.en: I am painfully aware that staff have a heavy work schedule.
sentences.cn: 我非常清楚员工们工作繁重。

sentences.en: I’m going to be working to a very tight schedule (= including a lot of things that must be done in a short time ) .
sentences.cn: 我的工作安排将会非常紧。

sentences.en: It is the mother who is expected to reorganize her busy schedule.
sentences.cn: 应该让母亲来重新安排自己紧张的日程。

sentences.en: It's difficult to cram everything into a tight schedule.
sentences.cn: 日程紧，很难把所有事情都安排进去。

sentences.en: Mitchel's schedule had not permitted him to take time off.
sentences.cn: 米切尔的日程安排使他无法休假。

sentences.en: Mr Annan took a short break before resuming his schedule.
sentences.cn: 安南先生在继续自己的工作前先短暂休息了一下。

sentences.en: Ms Carey appeared to blame her breakdown on EMI's punishing work schedule.
sentences.cn: 凯丽女士似乎将她的精神崩溃归咎于百代唱片公司高度紧张的工作日程安排。

sentences.en: The election was held six months ahead of schedule.
sentences.cn: 选举提前了6个月举行。

sentences.en: The film's budget dictated a tough schedule.
sentences.cn: 影片的预算决定了拍摄进度会很紧张。

sentences.en: The jet arrived in Johannesburg two minutes ahead of schedule.
sentences.cn: 喷气式飞机提前两分钟到达了约翰内斯堡。

sentences.en: The space shuttle had been scheduled to blast off at 04:38.
sentences.cn: 这架航天飞机计划于04:38发射升空。

sentences.en: Then make a schedule or chart of your time .
sentences.cn: 然后作出一个时间表或图表，你的时间。

sentences.en: We were two months behind schedule, and already over budget.
sentences.cn: 我们的进度晚了两个月，而且已经超出了预算。

sentences.en: We will not cancel your holiday less than eight weeks before the scheduled departure date .
sentences.cn: 离预定出发日期少于八周，度假行程将不能取消。

sentences.en: You said it; I do have a problem with this schedule.
sentences.cn: 你算说对了，我确实对这份时间表有些问题。

words.tran_cn: 调度程序；制表人，计划员；程序机
安排（schedule的过去分词）；把…列表；把…列入计划
把…列入计划；为…制定时间表（schedule的现在分词）
安排，[计划]计划；编制目录；将……列入计划表

phrases.tran_cn: 早于（或落后于）预定计划
维修计划；保养明细表；维修图表
主要图表， 综合图表；设计任务书；主要作业表
adv. 按时；按照预定时间
生产计划；生产进度表；产品细明表
进度控制；工程管理；预定输出控制

phrases.phrase: to (或 on 或 according to) schedule

phrases.tran_cn: 工作时间表，工作程序表；工作进度表；工作记录

trans.tran_cn: 工作计划，日程安排，时刻表，节目表，课程表，清单
trans.tran_en: a plan of what someone is going to do and when they are going to do it
a list that shows the times that buses, trains etc leave or arrive at a particular place
a plan of what someone is going to do and when they are going to do it
to plan that something will happen at a particular time
to plan that something will happen at a particular time
